name: unfound
description: A post-apocalyptic city-building game for JS13k 2020

scripts.clean: rm dist/* ; cp src/index.html dist/index.html ; cp src/style.css dist/style.css
scripts.prod: npm run clean ; webpack --mode=production ; tar -zcvf dist/unfound.tar.gz dist/ ; ls -l dist/unfound.tar.gz

author: matt@mattwhite.co
